name: create_servicenow_ticket_for_high_risk_login
title: Create ServiceNow Ticket for High Risk Login
description: This template illustrates how Okta Workflows can be used to guard against high-risk customer logins. When a high-risk login occurs, the template automatically creates a ServiceNow incident with relevant information, enabling your security team to respond quickly and mitigate any risk to your site.

flos.name: Create ServiceNow Ticket for High Risk Login
